tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Arrive at Ngurah Rai International Airport and transfer to your resort. Evening free for relaxation.

tourPlan.title: Ubud & Rice Terraces
tourPlan.description: Explore Ubud’s cultural heart, Tegallalang rice terraces, and Monkey Forest.

tourPlan.title: Beach & Water Sports
tourPlan.description: Spend the day at Nusa Dua Beach enjoying snorkeling, surfing, and sunbathing.

tourPlan.title: Temple Visits
tourPlan.description: Visit Tanah Lot and Uluwatu Temples, enjoy Kecak fire dance at sunset.

tourPlan.title: Return
tourPlan.description: Final morning at leisure before flight home.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Marina Cruise
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Dubai, check in, and enjoy a dhow cruise dinner at Dubai Marina.

tourPlan.title: City Tour & Burj Khalifa
tourPlan.description: Explore Dubai Mall, Burj Khalifa, and Dubai Fountain Show.

tourPlan.title: Desert Safari
tourPlan.description: Experience dune bashing, camel rides, and desert camp dinner.

tourPlan.title: Old Dubai & Souks
tourPlan.description: Visit Dubai Creek, Gold Souk, and Spice Souk.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Last-minute shopping before departure.

tourPlan.title: Arrival in Leh
tourPlan.description: Arrive at Leh and rest for acclimatization.

tourPlan.title: Monastery Tour
tourPlan.description: Visit Hemis, Thiksey, and Shey Monasteries.

tourPlan.title: Pangong Lake
tourPlan.description: Drive to Pangong Lake for breathtaking views.

tourPlan.title: Nubra Valley
tourPlan.description: Explore Diskit Monastery and Hunder Sand Dunes.

tourPlan.title: Return
tourPlan.description: Return to Leh and depart.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Resort Check-In
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Male and take a speedboat to your overwater villa.

tourPlan.title: Snorkeling & Diving
tourPlan.description: Explore coral reefs and marine life.

tourPlan.title: Water Sports
tourPlan.description: Enjoy jet skiing, parasailing, and kayaking.

tourPlan.title: Island Hopping
tourPlan.description: Visit nearby islands and enjoy a picnic lunch.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Leisurely morning before speedboat transfer to the airport.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Seine River Cruise
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Paris and enjoy a sunset cruise on the Seine River.

tourPlan.title: Eiffel Tower & Louvre
tourPlan.description: Visit Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and Champs-Élysées.

tourPlan.title: Montmartre & Art Tour
tourPlan.description: Explore Montmartre, Sacré-Cœur, and local art galleries.

tourPlan.title: Versailles Day Trip
tourPlan.description: Tour the Palace of Versailles and its gardens.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Free time for shopping before flight.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Colombo City Tour
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Colombo and check into your hotel. Evening city tour covering Galle Face Green, Independence Square, and Pettah Market.

tourPlan.title: Kandy & Cultural Show
tourPlan.description: Drive to Kandy, visit Temple of the Tooth, and enjoy a traditional cultural dance performance.

tourPlan.title: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
tourPlan.description: Climb the UNESCO-listed Sigiriya Rock and explore surrounding gardens and frescoes.

tourPlan.title: Bentota Beach Relaxation
tourPlan.description: Travel to Bentota for water sports and beach relaxation.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Return to Colombo for your flight home.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Tapas Night
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Barcelona, check in, and enjoy a tapas tasting tour in the evening.

tourPlan.title: Gaudí & Gothic Quarter
tourPlan.description: Visit Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, and stroll through the Gothic Quarter.

tourPlan.title: Montserrat Day Trip
tourPlan.description: Day trip to Montserrat Monastery with panoramic views.

tourPlan.title: Beach Day & Flamenco
tourPlan.description: Relax at Barceloneta Beach and enjoy a flamenco show in the evening.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Free time for shopping before departure.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Copacabana Beach
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Rio de Janeiro, check in, and relax at the iconic Copacabana Beach.

tourPlan.title: Christ the Redeemer & Sugarloaf
tourPlan.description: Visit Christ the Redeemer statue and take a cable car to Sugarloaf Mountain.

tourPlan.title: Samba Night & Lapa
tourPlan.description: Experience Rio’s nightlife with samba music and dancing in Lapa.

tourPlan.title: Tijuca Forest & Beaches
tourPlan.description: Hike in Tijuca National Park and relax at Ipanema Beach.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Final morning at leisure before transfer to the airport.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Light Show
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Cairo and check into your hotel. Evening Pyramids Sound & Light Show.

tourPlan.title: Pyramids & Sphinx
tourPlan.description: Guided tour of the Pyramids of Giza and the Great Sphinx.

tourPlan.title: Egyptian Museum & Bazaars
tourPlan.description: Visit the Egyptian Museum followed by Khan el-Khalili Bazaar shopping.

tourPlan.title: Saqqara & Memphis
tourPlan.description: Day trip to the ancient necropolis of Saqqara and the old capital Memphis.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Free time before transfer to the airport.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Zurich City Walk
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Zurich, check in, and enjoy an evening stroll through Bahnhofstrasse.

tourPlan.title: Lucerne & Mount Pilatus
tourPlan.description: Day trip to Lucerne and a cable car ride up Mount Pilatus.

tourPlan.title: Interlaken & Jungfraujoch
tourPlan.description: Full-day excursion to Jungfraujoch, the Top of Europe.

tourPlan.title: Lake Geneva & Montreux
tourPlan.description: Visit Lake Geneva, Montreux, and Chillon Castle.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Leisurely morning before transfer to airport.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Gamla Stan
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Stockholm, check in, and explore the old town Gamla Stan.

tourPlan.title: City Tour & Vasa Museum
tourPlan.description: Visit Stockholm City Hall, Royal Palace, and Vasa Museum.

tourPlan.title: Archipelago Boat Trip
tourPlan.description: Full-day boat trip exploring the Stockholm Archipelago.

tourPlan.title: Uppsala Day Trip
tourPlan.description: Visit the historic university town of Uppsala.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Free morning before departure.

tourPlan.title: Arrival & Rome Evening Walk
tourPlan.description: Arrive in Rome, check in, and enjoy an evening walk through Piazza Navona and the Trevi Fountain.

tourPlan.title: Ancient Rome Tour
tourPlan.description: Visit the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Palatine Hill.

tourPlan.title: Florence Art & Culture
tourPlan.description: Travel to Florence and visit the Uffizi Gallery and Duomo.

tourPlan.title: Venice Canal Experience
tourPlan.description: Gondola ride through Venice canals and visit St. Mark's Basilica.

tourPlan.title: Departure
tourPlan.description: Leisurely breakfast before transfer to airport.
